seo.title: Live Quiz Platform for Streams, Classes and Events | Real-time Multiplayer Quizzes
seo.description: Create and host real-time multiplayer quizzes for classes, streams and events. Players join by code, answer on mobile, and see a live leaderboard.
seo.keywords: live quiz, real-time quiz, multiplayer quiz, quiz game for classroom, quiz for livestream, simple quiz, trivia live, host quizzes online, play by code
seo.h2: Live quiz game • real-time multiplayer • mobile join by code

f1.d: Latency-friendly gameplay, instant scoring and live leaderboard.

f2.d: Perfect for teachers, YouTubers, and events—no installs required.

f3.d: Create quizzes in seconds, invite with a code, and keep full control.

f4.d: Anonymous player join, host accounts and safe data handling.

faq.title: FAQ
faq.a1: Yes. Players answer on their phones and the leaderboard updates instantly for everyone.
faq.q2: Do players need to create an account?
faq.a2: No. Players join with the group code—only the host needs an account.
faq.q3: Can I use it in class or on a livestream?
faq.a3: Absolutely. Share the code or QR on your screen and start the quiz.
